message.highlife.drying_started: Drying started. It will finish in %s s.

message.highlife.alchemy_flask_loaded: Alchemy Flask packed with dried bud.
message.highlife.alchemy_flask_open_menu: Open alchemy_flask control with sneak + right click.
message.highlife.infusion_wand_need_herb: Pack the infusion_wand with dried bud first.
message.highlife.infusion_wand_loaded: Infusion Wand packed with dried bud.
message.highlife.infusion_wand_open_menu: Open infusion_wand control with sneak + right click.
message.highlife.seed_mixer_need_items: You need 2 seeds + dirt to mix.
message.highlife.peace_no_attack: You are too peaceful to attack right now.
